contactUs.name: Name
contactUs.invalidName: Name must be at least 2 characters long
contactUs.inquiry1: Do you have inquiry about Auto Drop?

faq.firstAccordingContent: Auto Drop is a website founded in 2023 in order to facilitate and streamline the e-commerce process for merchants by providing them with the service of automatically linking their store with famous sites and platforms that support drop shopping.
faq.fourthAccordingTitle: Is it possible to try the site for free?

about.pros: What is the advantages of electronic Auto Drop?
about.firstBoxContent: With Auto Drop, the process will be integrated between your platform, your online store, and us! how? By linking our products to your online store and automatically managing your current orders with ease and ease, without worrying about inventory or shipping and delivery.
about.secondBoxContent: Because we provide you with a large and diverse range of products that you can sell without dealing with the inventory yourself. It does not require you to buy a large amount of products and store them there. With a little capital, you can start your business...Auto Drop solved it
about.thirdBoxContent: Because we care about your e-commerce and ensure that your customers have positive experiences with your store, we have a team that is always ready to help you, answer all your questions and inquiries, and welcome your suggestions with open arms. Rest assured, you are in safe hands!
about.fourthBoxContent: We offer you more than 30,000 products that you can sell in your store. You can choose between different categories and the best-selling ones, and be sure! With us, you will always get original, high-quality products that your customers love and need. Because we care about keeping pace with the market in providing products at their peak and season in agreement with reliable and reliable suppliers.
about.fifthBoxContent: Don't worry about shipping orders to your customers, with us they will be shipped automatically. All you have to do is focus on marketing your online store and growing your business.
about.sixthBoxContent: At Auto Drop, we make sure to package your customersâ€™ products professionally and safely, and we guarantee that the product will arrive in its natural condition.
about.goalContent: Increasing opportunities to develop the world of e-commerce with new and diverse ideas and helping young people and entrepreneurs achieve their goals with a new vision for the future

forgetPassword.tip: Tip: Enter your email and we will send you a link to reset your password
forgetPassword.toastMessage: A link has been sent to your email to reset your password

resetPassword.invalidPassword: Password must be at least 8 characters long
resetPassword.toastMessage: Your password has been reset successfully

packages.allowed: The number allowed to automatically uploaded

home.header1: Start your e-commerce with Auto Drop
home.subHeader: Start your business with products at wholesale prices without capital by linking international drop shopping sites
home.subHeader2: Auto Doroob is your best and easiest world to enter the world of e-commerce.
home.howDetails: It provides you with support to establish your business. You do not need additional upfront inventory costs or shipping logistics services. It provides full connectivity to drop shopping sites.
home.firstDetails: At Auto Drop, you do not need capital to start your online store
home.secondDetails: Auto Drop provides you with more than 30,000 diverse products from international drop shopping sites.
home.thirdDetails: In Auto Drop, you can link products, upload their pictures, receive orders, and ship them automatically.
home.fourthDetails: In Auto Drop, you can automatically receive and ship orders to dropshipping sites.
home.order1: Automatically linking orders between the online store and drop shopping sites
home.order3: Automatically change the status of orders
home.products1: Upload products easily through the product link
home.products3: Automatically update the price, product quantities and options
home.products4: Upload the products to the appropriate classification for your store and add the profit percentage automatically
home.subLink1: Easy connection with the most popular platforms
home.subLink2: Easy connection with the most famous stores
home.stepsHeader: How to start in Auto Drop
home.step1: Install the app in your store
home.step2: Search for products and add them to your store
home.step3: Customers buy from your online store
home.step4: Orders are automatically placed in your account on the dropshipping site used
home.step5: Keep your profit from the price difference of the products sold
home.footer1: A website established in 2023 in order to facilitate and streamline the e-commerce process for merchants
